title: 'Defies common sense': Dr. Wen reacts to CDC guidelines
description: CNN Medical Analyst Dr. Leana Wen reacts to newly released CDC guidelines for individuals fully vaccinated against Covid-19.

title: TikTok is helping people find their dream home in lockdown
description: As vacant apartments pile up in big cities, real estate agents are increasingly turning to TikTok to match twenty-somethings with rentals that are a steal by pre-pandemic standards.

title: Watch 8-year-old actor's emotional award acceptance speech
description: Actor Alan Kim broke down in tears as he was honored with Best Young Actor at this year's Critics Choice Awards for his role in "Minari."

title: Woman's search for biological parents leads to dark discovery
description: Kathy Gillcrist knew she was adopted, but what she didn't know is that a search for her birth parents would lead her to the FBI's most wanted list. CNN affiliate WECT reports.

title: Car crashing through wall sends people scrambling
description: Patrons of a Charlotte martial arts studio ran for cover after a car came crashing through the wall.

title: Dr. Gupta examines 'promising' drug that may help Covid-19 effects
description: CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta speaks to a father participating in a trial examining how Fluvoxamine, an antidepressant, affects Covid-19 patients after being diagnosed with the virus.

title: Scientist explains how massive Siberian craters are formed
description: Another massive crater appeared violently and explosively in the Siberian tundra in 2020, leaving a gaping circular scar in the empty and eerie landscape. It was the 17th hole to appear in the Russian Arctic since the first was spotted in 2013.

title: Opinion: Palace hypocrisy is brutally exposed
description: If you've ever pondered the merits of going into business with your husband's grandmother, the events of the last week may have given you pause.

title: Serena Williams says she understood the 'pain and cruelty' suffered by Meghan
Top tech stocks are in correction territory. Here's why
description: Apple shares are down more than 15% from their January high. Amazon's stock is off 11% from a recent peak in early February. And chipmaker Nvidia has seen its shares plunge nearly 19% since the middle of last month.

title: For the first time, girls were eligible to be Eagle Scouts -- and nearly 1,000 earned the elite rank
description: Valerie Johnston knew she wanted to be a Boy Scout since she was 6.

title: Bruno Mars is begging the Grammys to let him perform
description: Despite selling millions of records and winning countless awards, Bruno Mars is not too proud to beg.

title: Meghan tells Oprah she had suicidal thoughts, that she was silenced and that baby Archie wasn't given security
Most distant cosmic jet discovered 13 billion light-years away
description: It has taken 13 billion years for the light from the powerful jets of a distant object to reach us.

title: UK tabloids hit back at Meghan and Harry's interview as 'self-serving'
description:
• How Meghan paid tribute to Diana's memory
• Is Meghan and Harry's interview a bigger crisis for the monarchy than the Diana scandal?
• Sign up for our new royals newsletter

title: 'I still can't put it into words': Stephanie Travers on the 'surreal' moment she became the first Black woman on an F1 podium
description: As Lewis Hamilton celebrated his victory at last season's Styrian Grand Prix, a member of the Mercedes team grabbed Stephanie Travers and told her she was wanted for the podium ceremony.

title: Uyghur journalist reacts after Beijing dismisses claims of genocide
description: Uyghur journalist Gulchehra Hoja, an anchor for US government-funded Radio Free Asia, reacts to Beijing's dismissal of claims of genocide in Xinjiang, China.

title: 11 things we learned from the explosive interview
description: It was the interview that some within Buckingham Palace must have feared -- but Prince Harry and Meghan, Duchess of Sussex's discussion with Oprah Winfrey was more revealing, explosive and potentially damaging to the royal family than many could have imagined.

title: There were concerns about Archie's skin tone, Meghan says
description: Meghan, Duchess of Sussex has said there was concern within the royal family about her baby's skin tone, and her husband Prince Harry condemned his relatives for failing to criticize colonial undertones in media coverage, in a series of damning and disturbing claims that threaten to spark a racism scandal around Buckingham Palace.

title: 'The Fight of the Century': a divided US nation 50 years on
description: By the time the first bell rang and Joe Frazier came bobbing towards him, Muhammad Ali was already four years into a fight that helped define him as one of the 20th century's most influential figures.

title: Lindsey Vonn hits the slopes in high fashion
description: Olympic skier Lindsey Vonn may have retired after the 2018 Winter Games, but a new fashion film unveiled Sunday shows her hitting the slopes again.

title: Deliveroo promises some riders $14,000 when it IPOs. Most will get far less
description: Amazon-backed food delivery startup Deliveroo has announced plans to give some of its busiest riders £10,000 bonuses ($13,850) when it goes public in a huge London IPO.

title: What's next with the Covid relief bill
description: The House is scheduled to vote Tuesday on the Senate version of President Joe Biden's $1.9 trillion Covid relief bill, a timeline that could see the sweeping legislation signed into law early this week.

title: Opinion: Whatever 'magic' is left of the Crown may not survive
description: Among journalists in Queen Victoria's England, Walter Bagehot was a central figure. Not only did he marry well -- to the daughter of the Economist's founder, whose death installed Bagehot in the editor's chair -- he also wrote a classic study of British government, "The English Constitution."

title: Djokovic breaks one of Federer's key records
description: Novak Djokovic has broken Roger Federer's all-time record for most weeks spent as the men's world No.1.

title: Barcelona stars past and present come out to vote as Joan Laporta wins pivotal presidential election
description: Barcelona stars past and present came out in number to vote in what was arguably the most important presidential election in club history, as Joan Laporta was elected for a second time.

title: Meghan says she 'didn't want to be alive anymore'
description: Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, told Oprah Winfrey she went into her marriage with Prince Harry naively and did not know what it would mean to be a working royal.

title: Bryson DeChambeau gets text from Tiger Woods; then wins Arnold Palmer invitational
description: Talk about having someone in your corner.

title: Jury selection begins in Derek Chauvin's trial in the death of George Floyd. Here's what to expect
description: The death that sparked a worldwide movement will take center stage in a heavily fortified Minneapolis courtroom on Monday as jury selection begins in Derek Chauvin's trial in the death of George Floyd.

title: 'We were the only airplanes in the sky' -- the surreal lives of Covid-era pilots
description: Darrell Myers remembers the surreal feeling last March when nearly all passenger travel shut down, leaving cargo pilots like him flying all alone.

title: Daylight saving time is a week away — here's how you can prepare now
description: If you've got a week in advance — or even if it's just the night before — one sleep expert provides plans for you to make sure daylight saving time doesn't throw off your sleep schedule.

title: Chinese selfie app pours cash into bitcoin and could buy more
description: Tesla turned heads last month when it revealed that it had invested big in bitcoin. Now a Chinese company is jumping on the cryptocurrency bandwagon, too.

title: Myanmar military occupies hospitals and universities ahead of mass strike
description: Troops in Myanmar have occupied hospitals and university campuses, and ramped up nighttime raids ahead of a nationwide strike to protest against the military coup, according to local media reports.

title: Billionaire MacKenzie Scott remarries, tying the knot with a Seattle schoolteacher
description: Philanthropist MacKenzie Scott, one of the world's richest people, has re-married after her 2019 divorce from Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos.

title: Bowling Green State University sophomore dies after drinking at fraternity event, family attorney says
description: A Bowling Green State University (BGSU) sophomore died after drinking at a fraternity event, an attorney for his family said.

title: A Connecticut mother is facing murder charges in the death of her 4-year-old son
description: A Connecticut woman is facing murder charges in the death of her 4-year-old son after he was found dead in their apartment Sunday morning, according to police.

title: Highlights from Harry and Meghan's Oprah interview
description: Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, dropped major revelations about the British royal family in a wide-ranging interview with Oprah Winfrey, including conversations the Royal family had about her son's skin tone.

title: Biden eyes big win that will send checks to millions of Americans
description: Joe Biden is on the cusp of a presidency-defining first 100 days victory and tens of millions of Americans could soon get stimulus checks as the $1.9 trillion Covid-19 rescue bill heads back to the House for a final vote.

title: Critics Choice Awards 2021: See the full list of winners
description: The 26th annual Critics Choice Awards, which honor some of the best film and television of the year, were presented Sunday.

title: CNN anchor calls out Tucker Carlson's QAnon compliment
description: In the wake of Fox News host Tucker Carlson referring to QAnon supporters as "gentle people," Pamela Brown fires back, citing the actions of the pro-Trump mob that stormed the Capitol on January 6.

title: New video: Man told officers 'I can't breathe' before his death
description: Joseph Perez's final moments, caught by a Fresno Police officer's bodycam in 2017, were released under federal court order. The family, who has filed a lawsuit against law enforcement officers, paramedics and others, requested the video's release.

title: How is the pandemic affecting mental health in young Americans?
description: Isolation, stress or even loss of loved ones due to the Covid-19 pandemic are all having an effect on mental health, especially among young Americans. CNN's Pamela Brown has more.

title: Grammys 2021 performers will include Taylor Swift, BTS and Billie Eilish
description: It's official -- Taylor Swift, BTS and Billie Eilish are among those who will be performing at the 2021 Grammys.

title: She's this country's first female tour guide, but she's determined not to be the last
description: For many people who work as tour guides, showing people around a new city involves a little bit of getting off the beaten track. But when there is no track at all, you just have to blaze one yourself.
